segments.text: Good afternoon ! Can I help you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Could you show me where the Chinesc-style clothing is located ? I want to buy a silk coat .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: This way , please . Here they are . They're all handmade .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , they look nice . May I try that black one on ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Of course . The fitting room is right over there .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Do you have a medium in the same color ? This one is a little tight .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: l'm sorry . All the black of that size are sold out . Would you like a red one ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: OK . Let me try it on . What do you think ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , that suits you very well . Besides it is believed in China that the red color brings happiness and good luck .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Really ? I'II take it and I'm leaving here tomorrow . Is it possible for you to send one in black to me by mail when you get it in ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Our pleasure . Please fill out this form , leaving your address and telephone number .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thanks . How much would that come to ?
segments.speaker: S2
